channel.title: Comments on: C# Dynamic Data Layer
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.description: Ah, that is kind of a pain. Should be able to use reflection to auto-map onto a specified type, but in this case it may be best to just embrace the dynamicness.
item.content:encoded: Ah, that is kind of a pain. Should be able to use reflection to auto-map onto a specified type, but in this case it may be best to just embrace the dynamicness.

item.title: By: chaospandion
item.dc:creator: chaospandion
item.description: I am still experimenting with the ExpandoObject but it seems to require manual mapping to convert to another object.
item.content:encoded: I am still experimenting with the ExpandoObject but it seems to require manual mapping to convert to another object.

item.title: By: Alex Ullrich
item.dc:creator: Alex Ullrich
item.description: This is a pretty cool use of dynamics. Could the expando object be cast to a specified type on the way out?
item.content:encoded: This is a pretty cool use of dynamics. Could the expando object be cast to a specified type on the way out?
